did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.abstract: This collection consists of copies of articles from Laughter in the Next Roomby Sir Osbert Sitwell and The Squadroonby Ardern Beaman.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: World War I Articles, 1948, n.d., in the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection, Accession #10875-k, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was given to the Library by Matthew Bruccoli, Bruccoli Clark Layman, Inc., of Columbia, South Carolina, on November 20, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains copies of two articles from World War I: "The devastated area" from The Squadroonby Ardern Hulme-Beaman and "Three ions in a grove" from Laughter in the Next Roomby Sir Osbert Sitwell, which Matthew Bruccoli intended to use in an article about deserter legends and life in the trenches which was never published.
